forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, then sunny by the afternoon. High 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
